name: NATURE'S SHOT
data: Competition in which the participants will be given a theme and they have to click photograph of what they interpret from the nature about the topic given to them in the given time duration.

name: LET'S NOT JUDGE
data: An event which provides a platform for creative writers who will be given a topic on which they can express their views in any form of writing, may it be poetry or article.

name: KIRTAN COMPETITION
data: The event includes solo performance for classical kirtan competition.

name: SINGH VS KAUR
data: Participants need to showcase their talents and represent their innerself. It will include a talent round, ramp-walk and a questionaire round.

name: GATKA AND DHADI
data: Divine circle students will perform gatka and dhadi (religious musical performance).

name: GYAN BODH
data: A competitive quiz with multiple rounds based on gurmat. Combination of modern sikh life with early sikh heritage.

name: FASHION WALK
data: This is an event for divine circle members which will involve representation of punjabi culture which ethnic wears and ramp-walk.

name: GATKA COMPETITION
data: Participants need to show their martial art skills in form of shastar vidya.

name: EK NOOR (EXHIBITION)
data: Dispaly of creativity through any kind of art, it can include paintings, poetry, sketches or photographs.
